title: Profanity in Username
body:
Hello,

In League Of Legends, my friend attempted to Choose his summoner name and chose his username for everything which is "NKarassy955". It was shown as profanity due to the letters in the username. He was wondering if there was any way someone could manually set this as my username, if so that would be great! 

Thank You

replies.body:
Original Poster is just using a new age term that is a variation of the N word.
Sound out the username and you will hear it.  They couldn't be more blatant with the capital letters.

Note:   I don't have anything to gain from this ... just sick of seeing even my own kids pulling this immature garbage.

That's odd. While it does have "ass" in it, our system shouldn't be picking that up as offensive. Go ahead and have him hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to help him there ^_^!
